- Now, you can blame husbands and partners for that. 
- I think so.

1681.text: I think it's their fault. It is THEIR fault.

1683.text:
- The one brewery they don't visit! 
- Exactly.

1686.text:
- The Ramblers have done it again. 
- Yeah. 
- Oh, dear.

1689.text: Thank you very much for playing.

1691.text: It's great to see your team and brilliant to have the song earlier.

1694.text: Commiserations, Valley Voice. The Eggheads have done

1698.text: and they still reign supreme over Quizland.

1700.text: I'm afraid you won't be going home with the £5,000,

1703.text: so the money rolls over to our next show. Eggheads, well done.

1707.text: You're starting to get a bit of your gumption back, I think,

1710.text: and I'm wondering who's ever going to win.

1712.text: Join us next time to see if a new team of Challengers

1715.text: have the brains to defeat this lot.

1717.text: £6,000 is on the table. Until then, goodbye.
